text: wla tahsabana -ayha alrswl- 'ana allah ghafl eamaa yemlh alzalmwn: min altkdhyb bik wbghyrk min alrsl, w'iydha' almuminin waghayr dhlk min almeasy, 'iinama ywkhkhir eqabhm liawm shadid tartafie fih eywnhm wala taghmad; min hwl ma trah. wafi hdha tslyt larasul allah muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
